chapter.title: Creating a New BML Scheme
chapter.para: The look of your site is probably the first thing you're going to want to customize, because c'mon, who wants a LiveJournal.com clone?

section.para:
You'll want to create a new cgi-bin/bmlp-local.cfg file in your cvs/local directory.
To start your scheme, you're going to want to create a folder under the bml scheme directory (/cvs/local/cgi-bin/bml/scheme/). The name of this folder will be the unique identifier for the template you're creating, which you will use later for testing purposes.

section.title: BML Blocks to Worry About
section.para: In BML, global blocks are defined in the file cgi-bin/bml/scheme/global.look. Global blocks are simply initial template definitions, which other schemes look up to fall back on when their own local template hasn't been defined.
